Manuals, Tutorials, and Documentations

Programming

  • R Basics
    online resource: Eric Nord’s Essential R and Winston Chang’s cookbook for R are good materials to start R.
    book: Paul Teetor’s R Cookbook is an excellent and comprehensive introductory book to start R.
    cheatsheet: If you are familiar with Matlab, this cheatsheet will be very helpful for you to transfer from Matlab/Octave to R.
  • R advanced
    Since R is mainly a programming language for statistical computations, the advanced topics in R programming are related to statistics. Daniel Wollschlaeger’s R Examples Repository has a good collection of advanced topics in R.
  • Python
    To be added.

Data Analysis, Statistics, and Machine Learning

  • Hypothesis Testing

  • Data Science Courses Resources
    Johns Hopkins University offers a data science specialization track on Coursera.

Neuroimaging

  • (functional) Magnetic Resonance Imaging
    Judy Culham’s fMRI 4 Newbies has a comprehensive list of fMRI related tutorials.
